panels.description: Moving Average 1d (smoothened to see trends). Rate of VW Queries observed on servers.
panels.title: VW QPS Trend

panels.description: Moving Average 1d (smoothened to see trends). Pct 95 for query latency observed on servers. E.g. pct95 mean 95% of queries took less than this value
panels.title: Queries Duration Trend

panels.description: Each point represent the percentage of queries that took more than 10s
panels.title: Slow Queries Trend

panels.description: Rate of Queries observed on servers. Unlimited are queries that don't use a Virtual WareHouse like Select on system tables.
panels.title: Queries Per Sec

panels.description: Current running Queries observed on servers.
panels.title: Current Queries

panels.description: Success rate calculated with 1 - ( failure rate / total queries rate) excluding QueriesFailedFromUser queries
panels.title: VW Queries Success

panels.description: Percentage of pod from a workergroup with >80% Memory Usage
panels.title: Percentage of Workers with >80% Memory Usage

panels.content: Made with ❤️ and [Grafonnet](https://github.com/grafana/grafonnet-lib). Contribute to this dashboard on [Bytehouse GitLab](https://code.byted.org/bytehouse/kube-prometheus-stack/tree/master/dashboards/)
panels.title: Source
